overview: Bunsaku and Konosuke used to work together. However, after the suicide of Konosuke's childhood friend Natsume, the two go their separate ways. Then, a parcel addressed to Konosuke arrives from Tsugusawa who was the cameraman on Natsume's film.
tagline: Two people became estranged in the wake of a death. Can they ever meet again?
title: Double Red
